items.title: Black Panther: Wakanda Forever
items.plot: The people of Wakanda fight to protect their home from intervening world powers as they mourn the death of King T'Challa.
items.stars: Letitia Wright, Lupita Nyong'o, Danai Gurira, Winston Duke

items.title: Knock at the Cabin
items.plot: While vacationing, a girl and her parents are taken hostage by armed strangers who demand that the family make a choice to avert the apocalypse.
items.stars: Dave Bautista, Jonathan Groff, Rupert Grint, Nikki Amuka-Bird

items.title: Avatar: The Way of Water
items.plot: Jake Sully lives with his newfound family formed on the extrasolar moon Pandora. Once a familiar threat returns to finish what was previously started, Jake must work with Neytiri and the army of the Na'vi race to protect their home.
items.stars: Sam Worthington, Zoe Saldana, Sigourney Weaver, Stephen Lang

items.title: Plane
items.plot: A pilot finds himself caught in a war zone after he's forced to land his commercial aircraft during a terrible storm.
items.stars: Gerard Butler, Mike Colter, Tony Goldwyn, Yoson An

items.title: The Banshees of Inisherin
items.plot: Two lifelong friends find themselves at an impasse when one abruptly ends their relationship, with alarming consequences for both of them.
items.stars: Colin Farrell, Brendan Gleeson, Kerry Condon, Pat Shortt

items.title: Everything Everywhere All at Once
items.plot: A middle-aged Chinese immigrant is swept up into an insane adventure in which she alone can save existence by exploring other universes and connecting with the lives she could have led.
items.stars: Michelle Yeoh, Stephanie Hsu, Jamie Lee Curtis, Ke Huy Quan

items.title: Puss in Boots: The Last Wish
items.fullTitle: Puss in Boots: The Last Wish (2022)
items.plot: When Puss in Boots discovers that his passion for adventure has taken its toll and he has burned through eight of his nine lives, he launches an epic journey to restore them by finding the mythical Last Wish.
items.stars: Antonio Banderas, Salma Hayek, Harvey Guillén, Florence Pugh

items.title: M3GAN
items.plot: A robotics engineer at a toy company builds a life-like doll that begins to take on a life of its own.
items.stars: Allison Williams, Violet McGraw, Ronny Chieng, Amie Donald

items.title: Magic Mike's Last Dance
items.plot: Mike takes to the stage again, following a business deal that went bust, leaving him broke and taking bartender gigs in Florida. Mike heads to London with a wealthy socialite who lures him with an offer he can't refuse.
items.stars: Salma Hayek, Channing Tatum, Joe Manganiello, Matt Bomer

items.title: The Whale
items.plot: A reclusive, morbidly obese English teacher attempts to reconnect with his estranged teenage daughter.
items.stars: Brendan Fraser, Sadie Sink, Ty Simpkins, Hong Chau

items.title: Tár
items.plot: Set in the international world of Western classical music, the film centers on Lydia Tár, widely considered one of the greatest living composer-conductors and the very first female director of a major German orchestra.
items.stars: Cate Blanchett, Noémie Merlant, Nina Hoss, Sophie Kauer

items.title: Triangle of Sadness
items.plot: A fashion model celebrity couple join an eventful cruise for the super-rich.
items.stars: Thobias Thorwid, Harris Dickinson, Charlbi Dean, Jiannis Moustos

items.title: 80 for Brady
items.plot: A group of friends made it their life-long mission to go to the Super Bowl and meet NFL superstar Tom Brady.
items.stars: Rita Moreno, Jane Fonda, Sally Field, Lily Tomlin

items.title: The Fabelmans
items.plot: Growing up in post-World War II era Arizona, young Sammy Fabelman aspires to become a filmmaker as he reaches adolescence, but soon discovers a shattering family secret and explores how the power of films can help him see the truth.
items.stars: Michelle Williams, Gabriel LaBelle, Paul Dano, Judd Hirsch

items.title: Infinity Pool
items.plot: James and Em Foster are enjoying an all-inclusive beach vacation in the fictional island of La Tolqa, when a fatal accident exposes the resort's perverse subculture of hedonistic tourism, reckless violence and surreal horrors.
items.stars: Alexander Skarsgård, Mia Goth, Cleopatra Coleman, Dunja Sepcic

items.title: A Man Called Otto
items.plot: Otto is a grump who's given up on life following the loss of his wife and wants to end it all. When a young family moves in nearby, he meets his match in quick-witted Marisol, leading to a friendship that will turn his world around.
items.stars: Tom Hanks, Mariana Treviño, Rachel Keller, John Higgins

items.title: Pathaan
items.plot: An Indian spy takes on the leader of a group of mercenaries who have nefarious plans to target his homeland.
items.stars: Shah Rukh Khan, Deepika Padukone, John Abraham, Dimple Kapadia

items.title: Titanic
items.plot: A seventeen-year-old aristocrat falls in love with a kind but poor artist aboard the luxurious, ill-fated R.M.S. Titanic.
items.stars: Leonardo DiCaprio, Kate Winslet, Billy Zane, Kathy Bates

items.title: Women Talking
items.plot: Do nothing. Stay and fight. Or leave. In 2010, the women of an isolated religious community grapple with reconciling a brutal reality with their faith.
items.stars: Rooney Mara, Claire Foy, Jessie Buckley, Frances McDormand

items.title: The Wandering Earth II
items.plot: Humans built huge engines on the surface of the earth to find a new home. But the road to the universe is perilous. In order to save earth, young people once again have to step forward to start a race against time for life and death.
items.stars: Andy Lau, Zina Blahusova, Jing Wu, Clara Lee

items.title: Missing
items.plot: After her mother goes missing, a young woman tries to find her from home, using tools available to her online.
items.stars: Tim Griffin, Ava Zaria Lee, Nia Long, Kimberly Cheng

items.title: Devotion (II)
items.plot: A pair of U.S. Navy fighter pilots risk their lives during the Korean War and become some of the Navy's most celebrated wingmen.
items.stars: Jonathan Majors, Glen Powell, Christina Jackson, Thomas Sadoski

items.title: The Woman King
items.plot: A historical epic inspired by true events that took place in The Kingdom of Dahomey, one of the most powerful states of Africa in the 18th and 19th centuries.
items.stars: Viola Davis, Thuso Mbedu, Lashana Lynch, Sheila Atim

items.title: Close (I)
items.plot: The intense friendship between two thirteen-year old boys Leo and Remi suddenly gets disrupted. Struggling to understand what has happened, Léo approaches Sophie, Rémi's mother. "Close" is a film about friendship and responsibility.
items.stars: Eden Dambrine, Gustav De Waele, Émilie Dequenne, Léa Drucker

items.title: Living
items.plot: In 1950s London, a humorless civil servant decides to take time off work to experience life after receiving a grim diagnosis.
items.stars: Bill Nighy, Aimee Lou Wood, Alex Sharp, Adrian Rawlins

items.title: The Amazing Maurice
items.plot: This story follows Maurice, a goofy streetwise cat, who has the perfect money-making scam. He finds a dumb-looking kid who plays a pipe and has his very own horde of rats, who are strangely literate.
items.stars: Hugh Laurie, Emilia Clarke, David Thewlis, Himesh Patel

items.title: The Outwaters
items.plot: Four travelers encounter menacing phenomena while camping in a remote stretch of the Mojave Desert.
items.stars: Robbie Banfitch, Angela Basolis, Scott Schamell, Michelle May

items.title: She Came from the Woods
items.plot: In 1987, a group of counselors accidentally unleash a decades' old evil on the last night of summer camp.
items.stars: Cara Buono, Clare Foley, Spencer List, William Sadler

items.title: Seriously Red
items.plot: A realtor pursues a new career as a Dolly Parton impersonator.
items.stars: Krew Boylan, Daniel Webber, Rose Byrne, Celeste Barber

items.title: City of God
items.plot: In the slums of Rio, two kids' paths diverge as one struggles to become a photographer and the other a kingpin.
items.stars: Alexandre Rodrigues, Leandro Firmino, Matheus Nachtergaele, Phellipe Haagensen

items.title: Consecration
items.plot: After the alleged suicide of her priest brother, Grace travels to the remote Scottish convent where he fell to his death. Distrusting the Church's account, she uncovers murder, sacrilege and a disturbing truth about herself.
items.stars: Jena Malone, Danny Huston, Ian Pirie, Janet Suzman

items.title: Fear
items.plot: A much needed getaway and a celebration weekend turns into a nightmare due to the contagious airborne threat.
items.stars: Tyler Abron, Jessica Allain, Mezi Atwood, Andrew Bachelor

items.title: All the Beauty and the Bloodshed
items.fullTitle: All the Beauty and the Bloodshed (2022)
items.plot: Follows the life of artist Nan Goldin and the downfall of the Sackler family, the pharmaceutical dynasty who was greatly responsible for the opioid epidemic's unfathomable death toll.
items.stars: Nan Goldin, David Armstrong, Marina Berio, Noemi Bonazzi

items.title: Godland
items.plot: At the end of the 19th century, a young Danish priest is sent to a remote part of Iceland. The deeper he travels into the Icelandic landscape, the more he loses a sense of his own reality, his mission and his sense of duty.
items.stars: Elliott Crosset Hove, Ingvar Sigurdsson, Vic Carmen Sonne, Jacob Lohmann

items.title: Despicable Me
items.plot: When a criminal mastermind uses a trio of orphan girls as pawns for a grand scheme, he finds their love is profoundly changing him for the better.
items.stars: Steve Carell, Jason Segel, Russell Brand, Julie Andrews

items.title: My Bloody Valentine
items.plot: A decades-old folk tale surrounding a deranged murderer killing those who celebrate Valentine's Day turns out to be true to legend when a group defies the killer's order and people start turning up dead.
items.stars: Paul Kelman, Lori Hallier, Neil Affleck, Keith Knight

items.title: Michael
items.plot: The gang fighting over places. A youngster decides to gain control of the area. Can he complete his dream of ruling over the place?
items.stars: Vijay Sethupathi, Sundeep Kishan, Varalaxmi Sarathkumar, Gautham Vasudev Menon

items.title: Sword Art Online the Movie: Progressive - Scherzo of Deep Night
items.fullTitle: Sword Art Online the Movie: Progressive - Scherzo of Deep Night (2022)
items.plot: Two months have passed since the deadly game began, and Kirito and Asuna continue to make progress. They stop for treasure, but then they must face Asuna's least favorite monster.
items.stars: Haruka Tomatsu, Yoshitsugu Matsuoka, Shiori Izawa, Kaede Hondo

items.title: Kali Jotta
items.plot: Kali Jotta is an upcoming Punjabi movie scheduled to be released on 3 Feb, 2023. The movie is directed by Vijay Kumar Arora and will feature Neeru Bajwa, Satinder Sartaaj and Wamiqa Gabbi ... See full summary
items.stars: Satinder Sartaaj, Ankur Verma, Neeru Bajwa, Wamiqa Gabbi

items.title: Amigos
items.plot: Plot revolves around the 2 Doppelgangers, Siddharth an entrepreneur and Manjunath a software engineer of the Gangster Michael.
items.stars: Nithin Prasanna, Nandamuri Kalyan Ram, Ashika Ranganath

items.title: Writer Padmabhushan
items.plot: Padmabhushan, a 25-year-old aspiring writer based out of Vijayawada and his middle class family take us on a roller coaster ride packed with innocuous fun and soft emotions, with their heart in the right place.
items.stars: Gowri Priya, Rohini, Tina Shilparaj, Suhas

items.title: Freedom's Path
items.plot: When a soldier deserts from battle, he soon discovers the true cost of war through a young heroic black man, who teaches him the real meaning of Freedom.
items.stars: Gerran Howell, RJ Cyler, Ewen Bremner, Harrison Gilbertson

items.title: On the Silver Globe
items.plot: A team of astronauts land on an inhabitable planet and form a society. Many years later, a single astronaut is sent to the planet and becomes a messiah.
items.stars: Andrzej Seweryn, Jerzy Trela, Grazyna Dylag, Waldemar Kownacki

items.title: Love Jones
items.plot: Darius Lovehall is a young black poet in Chicago who starts dating Nina Mosley, a beautiful and talented photographer. While trying to figure out if they've got a "love thing" or are just "... See full summary
items.stars: Larenz Tate, Nia Long, Isaiah Washington, Lisa Nicole Carson

items.title: Let It Be Morning
items.plot: A gently satirical tale of a man and his family trapped by military blockade inside a tiny Arab village in Israel.
items.stars: Alex Bakri, Juna Suleiman, Salim Daw, Ehab Salami

items.title: Dada
items.plot: A couple in love, accidentally become teenage parents. Unpleasant situations make them fall apart. Manikandan, left alone with his son, struggles as a single teenage father. Fate owns him, bringing Sindhu back into his life.
items.stars: Pradeep Anthony, Bhagyaraj, Aishwariyaa Bhaskaran, Aparna Das

items.title: El Matareed
items.plot: Salah returns home from America after the death of his father to gain his inheritance and sell some properties, including a football club.
items.stars: Ahmed Hatem, Tara Emad, Eyad Nassar, Mahmoud El-Bizzawy

items.title: Vaalvi
items.plot: Aniket and Avani, a couple, decide to end their lives together. A foolproof plan is made, but by Aniket and his girlfriend Devika. So, is a suicide being executed or a murder being planned?
items.stars: Namrata Awate Sambherao, Subodh Bhave, Anita Date-Kelkar, Swapnil Joshi

items.title: Family Matters
items.plot: This tear-jerking dramedy centers on a family whose members squabble with each other over who will take care of their stroke-stricken father.
items.stars: Noel Trinidad, Liza Lorena, Nonie Buencamino, Agot Isidro

items.title: Call Northside 777
items.plot: Chicago reporter P.J. McNeal re-opens a decade-old murder case.
items.stars: James Stewart, Richard Conte, Lee J. Cobb, Helen Walker

items.title: Mother with Us
items.plot: In the midst of the COVID-19 post-pandemic, an image of Mary Immaculate traveled 10,800 kilometers over six months through much of the country.
items.stars: Juan Lombardero, Javier Lorenzo, Cristina Mediero, Marta Romero

items.title: Mommies Group
items.plot: A school WhatsApp group unites three mothers from three different social classes. Mariam and Nadia suffer from having a bad relationship with their children. When they find out that their children don't like them, Hana helps them.

items.title: Tu Hovein Main Hovan
items.plot: While one couple is falling in love, on the other hand another couple are on the verge of their divorce. Will their journey make their bond stronger?
items.stars: Sajjan Adeeb, Delbar Arya, Dinesh Arya, Darshan Aulakh
